summary: This bill, H.R. 4707, aims to officially designate the United States Postal Service facility located at 1019 Avenue H in Fort Madison, Iowa, as the "Martin L. Graber Post Office." The bill specifies the new name for the facility and mandates that any existing references to the original address be updated. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives by Mrs. Miller-Meeks, Mr. Feenstra, and Mrs. Hinson on July 23, 2025 and was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
